description: Automated USBL system verification with 7-step workflow, batch import with column mapping, quality dashboard, DXF export, and certificate generation.
author: S7 Solutions
certificateStatement: This is to certify that the Ultra-Short BaseLine (USBL) acoustic positioning system verification has been successfully completed. The spin test and transit test results confirm that the USBL system performs within the specified tolerances for offshore survey operations.
features: Batch import with per-file column configuration
Live chart preview - Watch data load in real-time
Auto-detect units - Guess based on coordinate magnitude
Quality dashboard - Visual gauges per dataset
Point selection - Click chart points to exclude
Verification certificate - Auto-generated PDF on pass
PDF, Excel, DXF, PNG, TXT export
